skillTree.localised_description: Steeds have long, sinuous bodies that writhe ceaselessly as they dash towards the foe.

attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

enabled_if: Enemy unit routing or broken within range

skillTree.localised_description: This large, slithering monstrosity of Slaanesh is a prized mount among Daemonettes, hissing and snapping with preternatural speed and mesmerising with their terrible gaze.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

enabled_if: Enemy unit routing or broken within range

skillTree.localised_description: This obsession with murder is just cheap, mindless bloodlust of the basest kind. To the servants of Slaanesh, there's so much more to life… and to death too, of course.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Khornate factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Khornate factions

skillTree.localised_description: The slightest glance, the merest glimpse from one of the Dark Gods is sufficient to propel their playthings to ever-greater feats of desolation.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
In fascination of his charisma and ambition, veteran and elder warriors alike give their lives to stand on a nameless battlefield side by side with Styrkaar.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Marauder units
	(Hero's army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Marauder units
	(Hero's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for Marauder units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Though he enjoys his fair share of bluster and screaming, Styrkaar is at his most terrible when he singles out his victim with but a stare and a wolfish grin.

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Fear for Marauder units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -33% for Marauder units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Despite Styrkaar's title being hereditary, none can deny it is one he is supremely well-suited to.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 10% for Marauder units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Daemonic presence seems to influence Styrkaar and those around him, bending their will to give him thanks and praise even as he disembowels them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: A violent upbringing is nothing unusual for those denizens of the Chaos Wastes who survive into adulthood. To bear it all with a silent smirk, however, is.
Even cattle in the Chaos Wastes have a dreadful reputation. Few have truly earned it like Styrkaar, however. Karnak, Asgeiir and Vandred the Majestic could testify to it, were they still living.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

skillTree.localised_description: No one has found a way to stay Styrkaar's blade once he has decided where it should go – invariably a spot where no skill or armour will deflect it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can never have its Melee Attack reduced during battle.

skillTree.localised_description: Styrkaar doesn't leave the battlefield unless he wants it. Nothing but the occasional wild revelry can tire him. His enemies are left with dying in futile attempts to kill him.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

enabled_if: Enemy unit routing or broken within range

items.colour_text: Styrkaar often goads foes into targeting him, the negligible pain they inflict fuelling his conviction that they are unworthy of inhabiting the same battlefield.
Raised aloft, these sigils amplify one's presence on the field, striking enemies with awe and horror as followers revel in the madness.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

items.colour_text: Styrkaar channels every smirk, sneer and supercilious remark he's ever made against his hapless challengers into an onslaught that sweeps aside the unworthy chaff.

ui_effects.localised_text: Causes severe disruption to enemy formations

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Ill intent and reverence alike cannot elude the unseen watcher at Styrkaar's shoulder, growing his legend in bloodshed and boastful grandstanding.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 for Marauder and Slaanesh devoted Marauder units
	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Marauder and Slaanesh devoted Marauder units
	(Hero's army)
